original_text: In him also you were circumcised with a circumcision made without hands, by putting off the body of the flesh, by the circumcision of Christ,
korean_text: 또 그 안에서 너희가 손으로 하지 아니한 할례를 받았으니 곧 육의 몸을 벗는 것이요 그리스도의 할례니라

sentences.original_text: In him also you were circumcised
with a circumcision made without hands
by putting off the body of the flesh
